std.value: Tom was very tired because he had stayed up late in order to finish his homework. The next morning, Tom was too sleepy to hear the alarm clock rang, so he overslept. When Tom got up, he realized he was going to be late for school. Hurriedly, he rushed out of home without having breakfast. On the way to school, he rode his bike as quickly as he could in case he would be scolded by his head teacher because of lateness. However, when he arrived at school, he found there was nobody there and the school gate was locked, which made him very puzzled. Standing there for a second, he suddenly realized it was Sunday. How forgetful he was!

To his confusion, when he arrived at the school, he found that the school was deserted and the gate was locked. After standing there for a moment, he suddenly realized that today was Sunday. How forgetful he was!
